name: Perfection!
description:
Do you have what it takes to achieve Perfection?

No Ads, no in-app purchases. Just Free.

**********
Toucharcade Picks of the week.

Pocket Gamer Bronze Award - " a simple, enjoyable puzzle title that gives your brain a bit of a jog"

iDownloadBlog - "Fans of simple puzzle games should grab this now"

Razorianfly.com - 10 New Apps You Should Totally Check Out This Week

Adrian Isén's Tech Channel - "Fun game you should defiantly check out"

**********

Perfection! is a game so beautifully simplistic in concept and design that you wouldn't believe it can be so complex, entertaining, challenging and addictive.

Take just a minute to get to know Perfection! and you will find yourself getting lost in the charms of this new and unique puzzle game for hours.

Your goal is to activate all of the tiles on the grid. If you can do this while only activating each tile once and without using any of the available power ups then you have achieved perfection.

Designed to take advantage of iOS 7 and larger screen sizes. Perfection is a universal app for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

A never ending challenge to suit every level of gamer from first timer to experienced veteran.

One deceptively simple game style that is adaptable, endless and utterly addictive.

3 Game modes to try and master:

- Rotary, one for the true strategists.

- Random, shuffle things up a bit.

- Timed, serious game, serious pressure.

5 different game board sizes on iPhone & iPod Touch and 10 different sizes on iPad.

Game Center Leaderboards to see how you compare to the rest of the world.

Game Center Achievements.
